snippet: Dr. John R. Pierce, director of the Department of Veterans Affairs’ medical investigation unit, is the fifth senior official to depart from the agency in the past six weeks.
abstract: Dr John R Pierce, head of the Department of Veterans Affairs’ medical investigation unit, steps down, becoming the fifth senior VA official to depart in the past six weeks, period during which the department has come under fierce criticism and intense scrutiny over patient care.
lead_paragraph: Dr. John R. Pierce, director of the Department of Veterans Affairs’ medical investigation unit, is the fifth senior official to depart from the agency in the past six weeks.

headline.main: After Criticism, Investigator Steps Down From the V.A.
